Articles.Content:
Hello, I am developing a PlanetPack Named "ProjectAlpha". It will Add planets in the Kerbol system, and add stars outside of the Region. I want to make this mod more of a community mod, with suggestions being a #1 Priority. So, if you have any ideas for planets/moons(Or Even Stars), Let me know, and it might be added and you will be credited when the mod releases!

 

Sincerely, Orbit.

Edited January 1, 2017 by InterstellarOrbit
